means: 铭刻在心里/记忆里/脑海里

sentence.Network_en: More often, all of the materials exposed to the etchant have a finite etch rate.
sentence.Network_cn: 通常, 所有暴露在刻蚀剂中的材料都具有一定的刻蚀速率.

sentence.Network_en: Hydrofluoric acid of Porcelain Etchant and phosphoric acid of UNI - ETCH are severe eye and tissue irritants.
sentence.Network_cn: 瓷酸蚀剂的氢氟酸和UNI-ETCH的磷酸是一种强烈的眼睛和组织的刺激物.

sentence.Network_en: We inspect etch channel density of the seed piece by piece.
sentence.Network_cn: 低腐蚀隧道:为确保低腐蚀隧道密度,我们对晶种的腐蚀隧道密度进行逐块检测.

溅射蚀刻(Sputter etching)--具有一定能量的离子机械的溅射衬底材料。 蚀刻速率(Etch rate)--材料的剥离速率,通常以?/min,?/sec,nm/min, um/min为单位计量。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Dutch etsen, from German ätzen, from a base meaning 'cause to eat'; related to eat

entry.def: If a line or pattern is etched into a surface, it is cut into the surface by means of acid or a sharp tool. You can also say that a surface is etched with a line or pattern.

example.ex: Crosses were etched into the walls...
The acid etched holes in the crystal surface...
example.tran: 那种酸在晶体表面蚀刻出一些小孔。

entry.def: If you say that feelings are etched on someone's face, you mean that the person is very strongly affected by them, and you can see this in their appearance.

example.ex: His grief was etched into every line of his face...
Every line etched on her face told a story of personal anguish.
example.tran: 她脸上的每条皱纹都讲述了一次痛苦的经历。

entry.tran: 使铭记在心;使刻骨铭心
entry.def: If something is etched on your memory, you remember it very clearly, usually because it has some special importance for you.

example.ex: The ugly scene in the study was still etched in her mind...
example.tran: 书房里丑陋的一幕在她脑海中依旧清晰。

example.ex: This stark image will remain etched in the memory of a generation of Berliners.
example.tran: 这种荒凉的景象将深深铭刻在一代柏林人的记忆中。

auth_sentence.content: Use the blunt side of a small knife to etch C-shaped swirls from a central air hole.
auth_sentence.res_content: Use the blunt side of a small knife to etch C-shaped swirls from a central air hole.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Use the blunt side of a small knife to etch C-shaped swirls from a central air hole.

means.word_mean: (感情)明显地表露在(脸上)；(脸上)明显流露出(感情)

sentences.en: Anthea’s face was etched with horror.
sentences.cn: 安西娅的脸上流露出恐惧。

sentences.en: Tiredness and despair were etched into his face.
sentences.cn: 疲乏与失望刻在他的脸上。

means.word_mean: 铭刻在心里/记忆里/脑海里

sentences.en: The image of their son holding up the championship trophy would be etched on their memories forever.
sentences.cn: 他们永远也不会忘记儿子高举着冠军奖杯的样子。

sentences.en: Yet few world-class rivers anywhere have etched a more enduring impression on as many millions for as many years.
sentences.cn: 然而,世界上很少有这样大的河流会给这样多的人留下这样长时间的令人难忘的印象。
